price: 67. Pour chaque communauté Nous avons établi un rituel qu’elle doit observer. Qu’ils ne disputent donc pas de cet ordre avec toi. Appelle (les hommes) vers ton Seigneur. Tu es dans la droite direction.
arabic: لِّكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ جَعَلۡنَا مَنسَكًا هُمۡ نَاسِكُوهُۖ فَلَا يُنَٰزِعُنَّكَ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِۚ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدٗى مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: likulli ummatin jaʿalnā mansakan hum nāsikūhu falā yunāziʿunnaka fī al-amri wa-ud'ʿu ilā rabbika innaka laʿalā hudan mus'taqīmin
translations: So let them not dispute with you
So let them not dispute with you
